launch.input_mnemonic_hint: Please enter mnemonic phrases and separate by space.
launch.create_wallet_warn1: Password is used for private key protection and transaction authorization.
launch.create_wallet_warn2: We DO NOT store your password, nor can we recover them. Please backup cautiously.
launch.why_backup_wallet: Why need to backup mnemonic phrases?
launch.reason_backup_wallet1: Mnemonic phrases can restore your wallet. Anyone who knows your Mnemonic phrases can take away your assets.
launch.reason_backup_wallet2: We DO NOT store your mnemonic phrases, nor can we recover them. Please backup cautiously.
launch.reason_backup_wallet3: Please write down the mnemonic phrases on paper and store it safely.
launch.reason_backup_wallet4: Do not save mnemonic phrases in Mail or network drive. Do not use network to handle a transmission.
launch.readed: I understand. And I have already prepared paper and pen.
launch.backup_mnemonic_prompt: Please write down the mnemonic phrases carefully. It will be required for subsequent verification process.
launch.confirm_mnemonic_prompt: Please select mnemonic phrases in correct order.
launch.agree_service_agreement: 我已仔细阅读并同意以上服务及隐私条款
launch.password_warn: Passwords must be at least 8 characters in length, contain at least 3 out of 4 of the following: one uppercase, one lowercase, one digit and one symbol.
launch.password_warn_least_8: The password must be at lease 8 characters in length,
launch.password_warn_1: passwords must contain at least one lowercase, one digit and one symbol.
launch.password_warn_2: passwords should contain at least one uppercase, one digit and one symbol.
launch.password_warn_3: passwords should contain at least one uppercase, one lowercase and one symbol.
launch.password_warn_4: passwords should contain at least one uppercase, one lowercase and one digit.
launch.password_warn_5: passwords should contain at least one digit or one symbol.
launch.password_warn_6: passwords should contain at least one lowercase or one symbol.
launch.password_warn_7: passwords should contain at least one lowercase or one digit.
launch.password_warn_8: passwords should contain at least one uppercase or one symbol.
launch.password_warn_9: passwords should contain at least one uppercase or one digit.
launch.password_warn_10: passwords should contain at least one uppercase or one lowercase.

home.symbol_check: 1 to 9 characters, for example ETH and ITC
home.decimals_check: The decimal precision of erc20 token is 0~36, mostly 18 digits.
home.address_repeat: The contract address has been added

transaction.alert_0: Failed to acquire the private key.
transaction.alert_1: Transaction failed. Please check the parameters.
transaction.alert_2: Please enter a valid transfer address.
transaction.alert_3: Please enter a valid transfer amount.

settings.export_keystore_modal_prompt: Anyone with the Keystore can access your assets!
settings.export_keystore_prompt: Anyone with the Keystore can access your assets! Do not save  Keystore in Mail or network drive. Do not use network to handle a transmission.
settings.export_private_key_modal_prompt: Anyone with the private key can access your assets!
settings.export_private_key_modal_prompt1: Please keep only hardcopy and keep it safe.
settings.export_private_key_prompt: Do not save private key on mailbox or network disk. Do not use network tools for transmission.
settings.scan_qrcode_prompt: The QR code can be automatically scanned by putting it into the frame.
settings.name: Name
settings.enter_normative_contact_name: Please enter a contact name (1-12 characters)

toast.exit_app: Click again to exit the app.
toast.space_separate_mnemonic: Please use space to separate the mnemonic phrases.
toast.not_modified_wallet_name: You did not change the wallet name.
toast.enter_valid_transfer_address: Please enter a valid transfer address.
toast.pwd_inconsistent_reset: 密码不一致，请重新设置

modal.permission_storage: Please allow permission to read and write storage space.
modal.screenshot_warn_content: Anyone who gains access to your mnemonic phrases can recover your wallet and control all your assets! Please write down the mnemonic phrases on paper and keep them safe.
modal.get_private_key_fail: Failed to acquire the private key.
modal.transaction_failed: Transaction failed. Please check the parameters or network status.
modal.enter_valid_transfer_address: Please enter a valid transfer address.
modal.enter_valid_transfer_amount: Please enter a valid transfer amount.
modal.ping_id_warn1: 登录密码一旦设置成功，将无法修改或找回。
modal.ping_id_warn2: 请务必记牢您的登录密码。
